SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.connector.yahoo

Class AbstractYahooFinanceConnector

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.connector.yahoo.AbstractYahooFinanceConnector
Direct Known Subclasses:
YahooSplitCalendar, YahooUDFConnect
public abstract class AbstractYahooFinanceConnector extends Object
Abstract base class for Yahoo Finance connectors that provides common functionality for making HTTP requests to the Yahoo Finance Visualization API. This class implements the Template Method pattern, providing a standard workflow for creating requests, executing HTTP calls, and parsing responses while allowing subclasses to customize specific aspects of the process.

      Template method for executing Yahoo Finance API requests. Subclasses implement specific request creation and response parsing.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of result returned by the subclass
      Parameters:
      requestParams - Parameters needed to create the request
      Returns:
      Parsed response data of type T
      Throws:
      Exception - if HTTP request fails or response parsing fails
